text: Say: "Call those whom you claimed/purported from other than God, they do not own/possess a smallest particle of any thing`s in the universe`s weight in the skies/space, and nor in the earth/Planet Earth, and (there is) nothing for them in them (B) from a share/partnership, and nothing for Him from them from a supporter/helper (God has no help from their gods and nor does he need their support or help)
